name: Policy Reinstatement from Pending Cancellation or Cancelled Status
description: As an Underwriter, I can reinstate policies that are pending cancellation or have been cancelled to restore them to active bound status with IMS synchronization

background.text: I am logged in as an Underwriter
I have access to the policy management system

scenarios.name: Successfully reinstate policy from Pending Cancellation status

steps.text: I am viewing the applications list
there is an application with 'Pending Cancellation' status
I right-click on the application
I click on the 'Reinstate' action button
the Application Status should change to 'Reinstated'
the reinstatement process should be initiated

scenarios.name: Successfully reinstate policy from Cancelled status

steps.text: I am viewing the applications list
there is an application with 'Cancelled' status
I right-click on the application
I click on the 'Reinstate' action button
the Application Status should change to 'Reinstated'
the reinstatement process should be initiated

scenarios.name: Application status updates to Bound after IMS binding completion

steps.text: I have successfully initiated reinstatement for an application
the Application Status is 'Reinstated'
the reinstatement is bound in IMS
IMS Status changes to 'Bound'
the system should fetch the IMS status
the Application Status should change to 'Bound'

scenarios.name: Reinstate action is visible for Pending Cancellation applications

steps.text: I am viewing the applications list
there is an application with 'Pending Cancellation' status
I right-click on the application
I should see 'Reinstate' as one of the action buttons
the 'Reinstate' button should be clickable

scenarios.name: Reinstate action is visible for Cancelled applications

steps.text: I am viewing the applications list
there is an application with 'Cancelled' status
I right-click on the application
I should see 'Reinstate' as one of the action buttons
the 'Reinstate' button should be clickable

scenarios.name: Multiple applications can be reinstated successfully

steps.text: I am viewing the applications list
there are multiple applications with 'Pending Cancellation' or 'Cancelled' status
I reinstate the first application
I reinstate the second application
both applications should show 'Reinstated' status
both reinstatement processes should be initiated

scenarios.name: Reinstate action not available for applications with Active status

steps.text: I am viewing the applications list
there is an application with 'Active' status
I right-click on the application
I should not see 'Reinstate' as an action button
only appropriate actions for Active status should be displayed

scenarios.name: Reinstate action not available for applications with Bound status

steps.text: I am viewing the applications list
there is an application with 'Bound' status
I right-click on the application
I should not see 'Reinstate' as an action button
only appropriate actions for Bound status should be displayed

scenarios.name: System handles IMS synchronization failure gracefully

steps.text: I have initiated reinstatement for an application
the Application Status is 'Reinstated'
IMS synchronization fails
I should see an error message indicating synchronization failure
the application should remain in 'Reinstated' status until sync succeeds

scenarios.name: Cannot reinstate application that is already being processed

steps.text: I am viewing an application with 'Pending Cancellation' status
another user is currently processing the same application
I right-click on the application
I attempt to click 'Reinstate'
I should see a message indicating the application is being processed
the reinstatement should not be initiated

scenarios.name: Application that was cancelled for exactly 30 days can be reinstated

steps.text: there is an application that was cancelled exactly 30 days ago
I am viewing the applications list
I right-click on the cancelled application
I click on 'Reinstate'
the reinstatement should be successful
the Application Status should change to 'Reinstated'

scenarios.name: Application cancelled for more than maximum allowed period cannot be reinstated

steps.text: there is an application that was cancelled for more than the maximum allowed period
I am viewing the applications list
I right-click on the cancelled application
I should not see 'Reinstate' as an available action
I should see a message indicating the reinstatement period has expired
I am viewing the applications list
there is an application with 'Cancelled' status
I select the application using keyboard navigation
I press the context menu key
I select 'Reinstate' using arrow keys and Enter
the reinstatement should be initiated successfully
the Application Status should change to 'Reinstated'

gherkin_content:
Feature: Policy Reinstatement from Pending Cancellation or Cancelled Status
  As an Underwriter, I can reinstate policies that are pending cancellation or have been cancelled to restore them to active bound status with IMS synchronization

  Background:
    Given I am logged in as an Underwriter
    And I have access to the policy management system

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: Successfully reinstate policy from Pending Cancellation status
    Given I am viewing the applications list
    And there is an application with 'Pending Cancellation' status
    When I right-click on the application
    And I click on the 'Reinstate' action button
    Then the Application Status should change to 'Reinstated'
    And the reinstatement process should be initiated

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: Successfully reinstate policy from Cancelled status
    Given I am viewing the applications list
    And there is an application with 'Cancelled' status
    When I right-click on the application
    And I click on the 'Reinstate' action button
    Then the Application Status should change to 'Reinstated'
    And the reinstatement process should be initiated

  @positive @integration
  Scenario: Application status updates to Bound after IMS binding completion
    Given I have successfully initiated reinstatement for an application
    And the Application Status is 'Reinstated'
    When the reinstatement is bound in IMS
    And IMS Status changes to 'Bound'
    Then the system should fetch the IMS status
    And the Application Status should change to 'Bound'

  @positive @ui
  Scenario: Reinstate action is visible for Pending Cancellation applications
    Given I am viewing the applications list
    And there is an application with 'Pending Cancellation' status
    When I right-click on the application
    Then I should see 'Reinstate' as one of the action buttons
    And the 'Reinstate' button should be clickable

  @positive @ui
  Scenario: Reinstate action is visible for Cancelled applications
    Given I am viewing the applications list
    And there is an application with 'Cancelled' status
    When I right-click on the application
    Then I should see 'Reinstate' as one of the action buttons
    And the 'Reinstate' button should be clickable

  @positive @bulk
  Scenario: Multiple applications can be reinstated successfully
    Given I am viewing the applications list
    And there are multiple applications with 'Pending Cancellation' or 'Cancelled' status
    When I reinstate the first application
    And I reinstate the second application
    Then both applications should show 'Reinstated' status
    And both reinstatement processes should be initiated

  @negative @validation
  Scenario: Reinstate action not available for applications with Active status
    Given I am viewing the applications list
    And there is an application with 'Active' status
    When I right-click on the application
    Then I should not see 'Reinstate' as an action button
    And only appropriate actions for Active status should be displayed

  @negative @validation
  Scenario: Reinstate action not available for applications with Bound status
    Given I am viewing the applications list
    And there is an application with 'Bound' status
    When I right-click on the application
    Then I should not see 'Reinstate' as an action button
    And only appropriate actions for Bound status should be displayed

  @negative @error-handling
  Scenario: System handles IMS synchronization failure gracefully
    Given I have initiated reinstatement for an application
    And the Application Status is 'Reinstated'
    When IMS synchronization fails
    Then I should see an error message indicating synchronization failure
    And the application should remain in 'Reinstated' status until sync succeeds

  @negative @concurrency
  Scenario: Cannot reinstate application that is already being processed
    Given I am viewing an application with 'Pending Cancellation' status
    And another user is currently processing the same application
    When I right-click on the application
    And I attempt to click 'Reinstate'
    Then I should see a message indicating the application is being processed
    And the reinstatement should not be initiated

  @edge-case @boundary
  Scenario: Application that was cancelled for exactly 30 days can be reinstated
    Given there is an application that was cancelled exactly 30 days ago
    And I am viewing the applications list
    When I right-click on the cancelled application
    And I click on 'Reinstate'
    Then the reinstatement should be successful
    And the Application Status should change to 'Reinstated'

  @edge-case @boundary
  Scenario: Application cancelled for more than maximum allowed period cannot be reinstated
    Given there is an application that was cancelled for more than the maximum allowed period
    And I am viewing the applications list
    When I right-click on the cancelled application
    Then I should not see 'Reinstate' as an available action
    But I should see a message indicating the reinstatement period has expired

  @alternative-flow @accessibility
  Scenario: Reinstate application through keyboard navigation
    Given I am viewing the applications list
    And there is an application with 'Cancelled' status
    When I select the application using keyboard navigation
    And I press the context menu key
    And I select 'Reinstate' using arrow keys and Enter
    Then the reinstatement should be initiated successfully
    And the Application Status should change to 'Reinstated'
